title: "Geometric Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website featuring a collection of abstract geometric wallpapers inspired by the latest web design trends and color schemes. Our wallpapers are perfect for adding a modern touch to your desktop or mobile device. With a variety of shapes, patterns, and colors to choose from, you're sure to find a wallpaper that suits your style. All of our wallpapers are available for free download in high resolution. Upgrade your digital space with our trendy geometric wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract geometric shapes and patterns, inspired by web design trends and color schemes."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
